p: Recent studies have shown that IVIg reduces the proliferation of Th17 cells, as well as decreases the production of IL-17A, IL-17F, IL-21, and CCL20 [ 98, 99]. In other study, IVIg appeared to modulate the Th17/Treg ratio which is associated with recurrent pregnancy loss [ 100]. It is plausible that CP may act in a similar way in patients with COVID-19 [ 28, 29] ( Fig. 1C).
